titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the rules for constructive ownership with respect to real estate investment trusts.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the rules for constructive ownership with respect to real estate investment trusts.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill modifies rules relating to the constructive ownership of assets in a real estate investment trust.
